Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Merchandise Mart
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Merchandise Mart due to mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Merchandise Mart due to mechanical problem on a train. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
